4316140.name: Nightfall Berlin
4316140.description:
Nightfall Berlin is an occult detective RPG with a focus on exploration, case-solving and our relationship to the places where we live and die, set in the dynamic, seductive and violent history of 90s Berlin.

Inspired by Vampire the Masquerade: Bloodlines, Deus Ex and Hellblazer, it weaves a tale of drug-fuelled conspiracy and self-actualization, that combines Germanic folklore with neo-noir themes. 

Set to the backdrop of the dynamic, seductive and violent history of Berlin, it mixes imsim-style exploration with clue-hunting and case-solving detective gameplay. 

Explore

Immersive sim-inspired traversal and level design without combat: use your skills and surroundings to avoid your enemies. Use spells such as telekinesis to influence the world.

Immerse

Discover the dark side of Berlin and its demonic inhabitants in a tale mixing occult history with the modern realities of the city.

Uncover

Find and combine clues, interview people and take photo for your Evidence Board. Make your decisions based on what you find and discover.
